name.ja: セレブ・リベレイション

requirement.en: When an opponent's monster declares an attack while you have a face-up LIGHT Attribute Spellcaster Type monster on your field, shuffle 1 face-up Equip Spell Card from your field or 4 LIGHT Attribute Spellcaster Type monsters from your Graveyard into the owner's Deck.

effect.en: Return up to 3 Attack Position monsters from your opponent's field to the owner's hand.
